org.jacorb.poa

Class POAManagerMonitorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacorb.poa.POAManagerMonitorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, POAManagerMonitorController, POAManagerMonitor

    public class POAManagerMonitorImpl
extends Object
implements POAManagerMonitor, POAManagerMonitorController, Configurable
    This class extends the POAManager with a monitoring gui for interacting with the POAManager and start and stop poa monitoring.
    Version:
    1.05, 12/08/99, RT
    Author:
    Reimo Tiedemann, FU Berlin
